long_description: When tuning your snowboard, alpine or nordic skis, choose the Swix CH4 Hydrocarbon Glide Wax for very cold, dry conditions. It's an excellent race wax, or can be used as a base wax. This wax is rated for -25degF to 14degF. The Swix CH4 Hydrocarbon Glide Wax can be mixed with other Swix Cera Nova waxes (not included) to increase durability on ice and aggressive man-made snow.
short_description: When tuning your snowboard, alpine or nordic skis, choose the Swix CH4 Hydrocarbon Glide Wax for very cold, dry conditions. It's an excellent race wax, or can be used as a base wax.
